00021 /**
00022  * @file   CalvinCHPFileBufferWriter.h
00023  * @author David Le
00024  * @date   Mon May 15 12:09:42 2006
00025  * 
00026  * @brief  Class for writing signals to a buffer before writing to CHP files.
00027  */
00028 
00029 #ifndef _CHPFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
00030 #define _CHPFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
00031 
00032 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CHPGenotypeEntry.h"
00033 //
00034 #include <cstring>
00035 #include <string>
00036 #include <vector>
00037 //
00038 
00039 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE                         5242880         // 5 MB
00040 
00041 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00042 {
00043 class CHPFileBufferWriter
00044 {
00045 public:
00046         class GenotypeBufferEntry
00047         {
00048         public:
00049                 u_int8_t call;
00050                 float confidence;
00051                 float RAS1;
00052                 float RAS2;
00053                 float aaCall;
00054                 float abCall;
00055                 float bbCall;
00056                 float noCall;
00057         };
00058 
00059 public:
00060         /*! Constructor */
00061         CHPFileBufferWriter();
00062 
00063         /*! Destructor */
00064         ~CHPFileBufferWriter();
00065 
00066         /*! Set maximum buffer size */
00067         void SetMaxBufferSize(int MaxBufferSize) { m_MaxBufferSize = MaxBufferSize; }
00068 
00069         /*! Cleans up memory */
00070         void Cleanup();
00071 
00072         /*! Initialize entry buffer writer
00073          * @param CHPFileNames Reference to a list of CHP file names.
00074          */
00075         void Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames);
00076 
00077         /*! Write an entry to buffer. If the buffer is full, flush it.
00078          * @param target Target for the Signal entry.
00079          * @param entry CHP genotype entry.
00080          */
00081         void WriteGenotypeEntry(int target, CHPGenotypeEntry &entry);
00082 
00083         /*! Write the content of the buffer to Command Console CHP file. */
00084         void FlushBuffer();
00085 
00086 private:
00087         // Pointer to list of CHP file names.
00088         std::vector<std::string> *m_CHPFileNames;
00089 
00090         // List of targets used for storing genotype entries.
00091         std::vector< std::vector<GenotypeBufferEntry> > m_TargetEntryBuffers;
00092 
00093         // Buffer for storing genotype entry row indexes.
00094         std::vector<int> m_TargetEntryRowIndexes;
00095 
00096         // Size of the current buffer in bytes.
00097         int m_BufferSize;
00098 
00099         // Maximum size of buffer before it gets flushed
00100         int m_MaxBufferSize;
00101 };
00102 
00103 }
00104 
00105 #endif // _CHPFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
